DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose protocol create registry elderly patient high-risk invasive bladder cancer undergo radical cystectomy without preoperative chemotherapy . Secondary objective include exploration association functional status , surgical complication , laboratory marker complication survival . In addition , exploratory analysis may evaluate association expression senescence marker p16INK4a morbidity mortality associate treatment . Patients ask complete Geriatric Assessment ( GA ) FACT-Bl serially course study order evaluate functional status quality life course treatment . Additionally , complication track inpatient outpatient set use Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center ( MSKCC ) complication grade system .
